sentences.sentence: Furthermore, WB-DWI revealed more metastases to the lymph lodes and extraskeletal organs.
sentences.translation: 此外，WB-DWI可以发现更多的骨外器官及淋巴结的病变。

sentences.sentence: He and they had been among the Nevada Mountains prospecting for silver, and were returning to Salt Lake City in the hope of raising capital enough to work some lodes which they had discovered.
sentences.translation: 一路上，他心情抑郁，默默无言。他和他们一直在内华达山脉中寻找银矿，现在正在返回盐湖城去，打算筹集一笔足够的资金开采他们所发现的那些矿藏。
